common.description:
If set to true, all instances of this
library will use the same value for this
field. The editor will display the input
for this field in a "Common fields"
container at the end of the editor form.

description.description: Description displayed with the field in the editor.

importance.description:
An indication of the field's importance.
Is typically used by the editor giving a
more prominent style on the more important
fields, but could e.g. also be used to
generate weighted input to a search engine.

important.description: This attribute is used to give more detailed instructions and contains two parts, i.e description and example.

label.description: The field's label in the editor.

name.description: Internal name of the field. Must be a valid JavaScript identifier string.

optional.description: Set to true for optional fields.

common.description:
If set to true, all instances of this
library will use the same value for this
field. The editor will display the input
for this field in a "Common fields"
container at the end of the editor form.

description.description: Description displayed with the field in the editor.

expanded.description: If set to true, group will be expanded. If set to false or not set at all, group will be collapsed. An exception is for groups in lists - they will be expanded except if this value is false.

generate weighted input to a search engine.

widgets.description:
List containing widget(s). A widget is defined as
an object with the name of the widget and a label.
Currently no widgets are provided by the core system,
but the H5PEditor.VerticalTabs library provides
`verticalTabs` as an option.

common.description:
If set to true, all instances of this
library will use the same value for this
field. The editor will display the input
for this field in a "Common fields"
container at the end of the editor form.

decimals.description: The number of decimal digits allowed. Use 0 for integer values.

Requires `showPalette` to be set to `true`.
